description: Nothing beats a storm like this waterproof-breathable insulated jacket built with an adjustable, rain-ready hood. Zippered hand pockets keep your goods dry and secure, while the elastic cuffs stay snug around your wrists.
name: Columbia Sportswear Cedar Cliff Insulated Jacket - Big - Mens

specs.value: 80g Microtemp XF II - 85% Recycled Polyester, 15% Polyester
